# Copilot Instructions for ArkNet Fleet Manager (Strapi Backend)

- [x] Scaffold Strapi backend in arknet_fleet_manager
- [x] Configure Strapi for SSH-tunneled PostgreSQL using .env
- [ ] Work through the setup checklist as required

## Setup Checklist
- Use environment variables for all credentials
- Ensure README.md is up to date
- Follow ArkNet naming and domain conventions
- Avoid technical/implementation names in user-facing docs
- Document any manual steps for SSH tunnel or DB connection
